body: err, we should change the namespace/function name to match the file.  Instead of torch::cuda::lazy_init, torch::utils::cuda_lazy_init.  Also maybe add a comment to the .h file indicating why it's not in /csrc/cuda (because we want to unconditionally compile it).

body_text: err, we should change the namespace/function name to match the file.  Instead of torch::cuda::lazy_init, torch::utils::cuda_lazy_init.  Also maybe add a comment to the .h file indicating why it's not in /csrc/cuda (because we want to unconditionally compile it).
